Room Division Management

This subject will provide students an insight of the management principles of a Front Office Manager as well as initiate them to the use of Room Management Software at the various steps of the guest cycle. Students have also the opportunity to learn on the importance of relationship with external partners, the processes involved in night audit and laundry management. Finally, the module initiate students to the financial dimension of management, with a review of room rating and yield management fundamentals.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Describe hotel working relationship with external partners such as travel agents

+  Calculate linen needs for in-door and out-door laundry, including latest green practices

+  Explain rules and principles for establishing room rates and practicing yield management

+  Perform room inspection and set room setting standards

+  Use effectively Room Management system at various stages of guest cycle

+  Set Sop for “crisis” management in housekeeping
